org.sqlite.database.sqlite

Interface SQLiteDatabase.CursorFactory

  • Enclosing class:
    SQLiteDatabase

    public static interface SQLiteDatabase.CursorFactory
    Used to allow returning sub-classes of Cursor when calling query.
